title: Bug 101409Quotation mark is missing when select string value in data set filter.
SR: Bug 101409Quotation mark is missing when select string value in data set filter. Description: Quotation mark is missing when select string value in data setfilter.Steps to reproduce:1. Add a data source and data set in a report design file.2. Edit data set filter.3. Select a string column and edit its value by selecting value.Expected result: quotation mark is added after selecting.Actual result: quotation mark is added only when select a character type.
